articles.title: In the COVID-19 fight, let’s channel the spirit of Rev. George Mackay, a Canadian hero of Taiwan
articles.description: The Canadian missionary promoted democratic values in Taiwan and helped establish its medical system. The WHO should follow in his example
articles.content:
Jin-Ling Chen is the director general of the Taipei Economic and Cultural Office in Toronto.
The COVID-19 pandemic has cast a shadow over the world for more than two years, and Taiwan, like most countries, is still fighting against the virus. But at ... [4305 chars]

articles.title: How to use Edge’s tools to protect your privacy while browsing
articles.description: Microsoft’s Edge browser has increased its focus on privacy. For example, it blocks trackers by default using one of three different levels of protection.
articles.content: One of the things that many people look for in a browser is how it protects their privacy against all the various trackers that are hidden in many of the sites out there. Microsoft Edge, the Chromium-based browser that is built into current versions ... [5128 chars]

articles.title: In Gujarat, Rahul cites Jignesh Mevani’s example, asks tribal youths to fight for their rights
articles.description: Gandhi, who arrived in Dahod for the launch of the Adivasi Satyagraha, also met with Congress MLAs of the tribal seats of Gujarat along with other tribal leaders to discuss the upcoming strategy of the party.
articles.content: Calling on the youths, especially from the tribal communities, to come forward in a “struggle for rights”, Congress leader Rahul Gandhi Tuesday urged the tribals to draw inspiration from Vadgam MLA Jignesh Mevani for his “fearless fight” against the ... [6524 chars]

articles.title: Cardinal: Pope's wheelchair use an example to older adults
articles.description: A top Vatican cardinal says Pope Francis’ willingness to work despite knee pain that has made walking nearly impossible shows other older adults that they have wisdom and experience to offer younger generations.
articles.content: FILE - Pope Francis arrives in a wheelchair to attend an audience with nuns and religious superiors in the Paul VI Hall at The Vatican, May 5, 2022. Pope Francis may postpone a planned visit to Lebanon next month due to health reasons, Lebanese Minis... [3201 chars]

articles.title: reMarkable, maker of a focus-friendly e-paper tablet, says it closed funding at a $1B+ valuation after selling 1M devices
articles.description: Hardware, as the saying goes, is hard; but there remains an opportunity for startups that focus on specific niches to build viable businesses. In the latest example, reMarkable, the Oslo, Norway-based maker of a simple and slick $299 e-paper tablet of the same name, says that it has passed 1 million devices sold since 2017 […]

articles.title: Century Plant Almost Two Stories High Is About To Flower in Texas
articles.description: Century plants are common throughout Texas, although it is rare for them to grow to the impressive proportions that one example in a backyard in Houston has reached.
articles.content:
A century plant almost two stories high in a Texas neighborhood is about to flower for the only time in its life.
The bizarre plant, which is in the backyard of a Houston home, is causing a spectacle for local residents, KHOU 11 reported.
Although it... [2130 chars]

articles.title: The Game 4 win over the Milwaukee Bucks was a microcosm of the Boston Celtics' season
articles.description: Boston has faced adversity all season, and Monday's comeback win against Milwaukee was the latest example of its resiliency.
articles.content:
The Celtics even the series behind an incredible second half from Al Horford, who scores a career-high 30 points in the win. (1:26)

articles.title: Border Tensions Notwithstanding, India-china Trade Is At A Record High
articles.description: India’s nonchalance in the face of its large and growing bilateral trade deficit with China is an example of rational commercial relations with a counterparty to a border conflict
articles.content: India-China trade crossed $100 billion for the first time, reaching $125 billion in 2021. And latest data just out shows the trend won’t change in 2022. China’s trade data for the first quarter of 2022 shows a sharp increase in India’s imports of Chi... [5654 chars]
